name: Hagra Sharpshooter
originalText: {4}{B}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: An effect that gives a creature -1/-1 is different from putting a -1/-1 counter on that creature. Notably, if the target of Hagra Sharpshooter’s ability has any +1/+1 counters on it, those counters will remain.

text: {4}{B}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
